subject: Re: Always check the datasheet!
author: psi_research
full_text:
Familier voices are not uncommon in this type of recordings. I guess 
it is similar to what causes residuals, thats a good point Juli. -Bill

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, juli velazquez <ghostchasingfool@...> 
wrote:
>
> Bill,   
>              I would also like to add that I have heard various 
colleagues voices through the box while doing a session.  I think the 
positive energy they also produce as a way of coming through.  I just 
recently heard Steve's voice and laugh during an afternoon session 
and when asked if he in fact was also conducting a session at that 
time stated he was not.  I am wondering if we too leave a voice 
impression, such as they do with conventional EVP?  An imprint of 
sort, kinda like a stone recording or residual haunting?
>    
>   Just something to think about!
>   Juli
> 
> psi_research <vilhellm@...> wrote:
>           Just because we project our thoughts into a Box session 
or even if we 
> hear our thoughts in our own voice when playing back an evp it 
> doesn't make it any less real. I don't even think it's problematic, 
I 
> think it's getting closer to discovering what the origin of the 
> phenomena is. It's our own pk energy. Our devices may picking up 
our 
> own psychic communication with the invisibles. -Bill 
> 
> --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <franks-boxes@> 
> wrote:
> >
> > 
> > In working with LM3820, that's the Delco radio chips I got form 
> B.G. Micro at 12 cents each, I had the things working a while back 
on 
> the breadbord, but the chips would not work when wired up on a 
> circuit board. I drew the damn schematic wrong!!! I'm wiring a new 
> board, and looking at the origninal schematic I had on -line, and 
I'm 
> thinking what the f---, this ain't right. I haven't powered up the 
> board yet, but it should work----this time.
> > 
> > 
> > I keep telling everyone you hear what you want to hear, or what 
> the subconcious mind projects, even onto pre-recorded tapes! 
> Listening last night to the tape I did Sunday night, and the Ol' 
Lady 
> yells out that the mattress heater was not working, and the very 
next 
> voice on the tape is about the matress heater not working! I doubt 
> very much that anyone else would hear it, but that is the probelm 
> with this stuff, few hear what others hear. Was the heater 
> voice "real"--I can't tell!! Maybe it's a precongnitive voice--I 
> can't tell! I think we create some this stuff on the fly, which is 
> very problematic for the research, but it has to be addressed. 
> > 
> > Frank-S
> > 
> > 
> > __________________________________________________________
> > Don't get caught with egg on your face. Play Chicktionary!
> > http://club.live.com/chicktionary.aspx?
icid=chick_wlhmtextlink1_dec
> >
> 
>
